sentences.en: A jellyfish is a spineless animal.
And you can laugh a spineless laugh!
And you can laugh spineless laugh, we hope your rules and wisdom choke you.
sentences.cn: 你可以蔑视那些缺乏骨气的笑声, 我们期盼着你们制订的规律和守则令你们窒息.

sentences.en: During his life Confucius loathed spineless, fawning sycophants, but he particularly phony gentlemen who appeared respectable.
sentences.cn: 孔子一生不耻没气节或巧言令色的小人, 但他尤其最痛恶与貌似恭谨的伪君子为伍.

sentences.en: Followership You don't have to be a spineless yes - person to be a good follower.
sentences.cn: 服从精神你无须凡事 唯唯诺诺 才算是一名好的追随者.

sentences.en: How long will I endure the insincere prayers of your spineless subjects?
sentences.cn: 我究竟还要忍耐多久你这种虚情假意的祷告?

sentences.en: If you feel that George Bush has been spineless overseas, Mr Giuliani is undoubtedly your man.
sentences.cn: 如果你认为乔治·布什在海外事务上胆小的话, 朱利安尼毫无疑问是你中意的人.

sentences.en: Teachers usually are pretty spineless , but you university professors are even worse.
sentences.cn: 大凡教书的人总是那么灰色的, 大学教授更甚.

words.tran_cn: 脊髓的；脊柱的；针的；脊骨的；尖刺的
没有骨气的；无脊椎的；懦弱的

trans.tran_cn: <贬>没有骨气的，懦弱的，（动物）无脊椎的
trans.tran_en: lacking courage and determination – used to show disapproval
